availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William A. Gailbreath (Louisville, Kentucky, cabinetmaker and grocer)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, cabinetmaker and grocer. Tennessee native. Married to Mary Malvina Thornberry Gailbreath in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on July 30, 1848. Father of Sarah Gailbreath and William Seth Gailbreath. Married to Mary Ann Hobbs Gailbreath in Jefferson County on May 5, 1861. Cabinetmaker in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Grocer in Jefferson County in 1860. Cabinetmaker in Louisville in 1865.
